Text: Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi wewe anyʼaka kakini:
Owñ la akajo̩ agbagba amone̩ ojoji ojoji wewe,
E̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ muda agugu of ikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpʼof oli o̩gbaikolo-wñ,
tak omi ache kʼe-ki te̩tachika ki mud e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩;
Oñ uwe̩, O o̩do̩go̩ ujo̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ le̩,
Fai e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ akwa taa ta?
I ki wʼe̩, kʼe̩ chʼakanya o̩ma ebi, uwe̩ o̩monobule̩ Zayo̩n, dabe̩ne̩ kʼonobule̩ kʼi achefu;
